2014-12-08-five-steps-of-the-emergency-f.title: Five Steps of the Emergency Fund
2014-12-08-five-steps-of-the-emergency-f.description: There are a plethora of personal finance and budget theories, but one element always seems constant, which is the emergency fund.

2013-07-09-three-ways-to-take-the-emotio.title: Three Ways to Take the Emotions Out of Your Money
2013-07-09-three-ways-to-take-the-emotio.description: Many of us on this journey to financial freedom, find it hard to stick to the plan long-term because it's extremely hard to change our behaviors when they are so ingrained in our society.

2013-07-02-how-to-create-a-zero-based-bu.title: How to Create a Zero Based Budget
2013-07-02-how-to-create-a-zero-based-bu.description: Learning a new concept can be tough. Not only are you trying to get things done, but you are also adding the overhead of a new process on top it. Fortunately, zero based budgeting is an easy skill to learn.

2013-07-02-budget-category-list.title: Budget Category List
2013-07-02-budget-category-list.description: Finding a list of budget categories online is tough. So, to help others, we decided to post ours.

2013-06-19-but-wait-this-wont-work-i-hav.title: Variable Income: Four Steps to Make It Work
2013-06-19-but-wait-this-wont-work-i-hav.description: Living on a variable income is a challenge. That's why budgeting must be a bigger priority.

2013-06-12-whats-a-zero-based-budget.title: What's A Zero Based Budget?
2013-06-12-whats-a-zero-based-budget.description: A Zero Based Budgeting means assigning every dollar of your income a job so your money works for you.
